column4: Could someone with Firefox & Totem plug-in take a look at this page, and tell me if it works for them?  http://metavid.ucsc.edu/wiki_dev/mv_embed/sample_page.php
which one should i click on?
The idea is to see if either the top and or bottom videos work.
For me, only the top does.
You might have to reload.  Or even restart (if you can)
Can you play them both at the same time?
What does you "about:plugins" say for OGG ?  Is it being run by Totem 2.18.1 ?
Ah, okay - I need to figure out what package it is so I can install it.  Thanks for your help.
